entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: Code in main.py has been updated, possibly enhancing features or fixing issues.
entries.impact: Users may experience improved functionality or stability in the application's main process.

entries.title: Fix bug related to saving to GitHub repository
entries.whats_new: Resolved an issue that prevented saving data to GitHub repositories.
entries.impact: Users can now reliably save data directly to their GitHub repositories.

entries.title: Set up cache saving to GitHub API
entries.whats_new: Configured the system to save cache data using the GitHub API.
entries.impact: Cache data is now stored via GitHub, improving data persistence and accessibility.

entries.title: Save cache permanently locally
entries.whats_new: Implemented storage of cache data to local persistent storage.
entries.impact: Increased data reliability by ensuring cache data persists locally across sessions.

entries.title: Add entry limits
entries.whats_new: Introduced limits to the number of entries that can be stored or displayed.
entries.impact: Prevents overload of data and maintains system performance by limiting the number of entries.

entries.title: Update changelog for 2025-04-23
entries.whats_new: Changelog entries for April 23, 2025, have been refreshed or added.
entries.impact: Users see the latest updates and changes made on this date.

entries.title: Merge main branch
entries.whats_new: Merged latest changes from the main branch of the code repository.
entries.impact: Ensures the latest stable code is integrated, possibly including new features or fixes.

entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Updated the list of Python dependencies required for the project.
entries.impact: Ensures the environment has all necessary libraries for the application to run properly.

entries.title: Interact with Railway and GitHub webhook
entries.whats_new: Integrated system with Railway deployment platform and GitHub webhooks for automation.
entries.impact: Automates deployment and updates, making developer workflows more efficient.

entries.title: Deploy on Railway
entries.whats_new: Application deployed successfully on Railway hosting platform.
entries.impact: Application is now available for public or team use via Railway hosting.

entries.title: Create requirements.txt and railway.json
entries.whats_new: Created configuration files for dependencies and Railway deployment.
entries.impact: Sets up the project for consistent environment setup and deployment automation.

entries.title: Collect interface definitions
entries.whats_new: Unified interface definitions into a single file for better manageability.
entries.impact: Simplifies interface management for developers working on the project.

entries.title: Polish front-end page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the homepage with decoration, loading effects, and code cleanup.
entries.impact: Provides a more polished and user-friendly homepage experience.

entries.title: Add details to Detail.tsx
entries.whats_new: Enhanced changelog detail page with a floating navbar and additional information.
entries.impact: Improves navigation and details display for individual changelog entries.

entries.title: Implement JSON cache connection
entries.whats_new: Changed back-end to generate a JSON cache file, which the front-end loads to display changelog entries.
entries.breakings_change: The back-end now generates a JSON cache before the front-end loads data, altering how data retrieval and display happen. This is considered a breaking change because it changes the data flow and potentially affects how previous components interact with the API.
entries.impact: Users will experience faster loads and more consistent data display, but developers need to update their data handling logic.

entries.title: Polish Sidebar and Changelog overview
entries.whats_new: Refined sidebar layout and basic page structure for the changelog overview.
entries.impact: Improves usability and navigation within the front-end interface.

entries.title: Implement front-end layout and sidebar
entries.whats_new: Built the layout with a collapsible sidebar and main content area for browsing the site features.
entries.breakings_change: This update introduces a new front-end layout structure, including a sidebar for navigation. It changes the visual and interaction design, which may affect existing users’ interface expectations. This is a breaking change because it modifies the overall user interface layout.
entries.impact: Users will now see a more organized interface with easier navigation, but existing workflows in previous layouts may need adjustment.

entries.title: Add basic front-end preview for changelog
entries.whats_new: Created a simple web page showing a generated changelog from GitHub, powered by OpenAI.
entries.breakings_change: This introduces a new user-facing web interface that displays changelog data automatically generated by OpenAI from GitHub commits. It significantly alters how users view changelogs and introduces new features for auto-generation, making it a breaking change for users relying on previous static or manual changelogs.
entries.impact: Provides users with an up-to-date, auto-generated changelog view, enhancing their understanding of project progress, but might require adaptation in workflows expecting a different presentation.

entries.title: Update LLM and schema support
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the language model support to identify autosupport for breaking changes in commits.
entries.breakings_change: The system now automatically detects breaking changes from commits, integrating this information into the changelog generation. This automates and enhances change detection, representing a break in previous manual or less sophisticated detection methods.
entries.impact: Developers and users gain more accurate details on breakages, improving transparency but requiring updates to the process of changelog creation.

entries.title: Implement second version of LLM and cache deletion
entries.whats_new: Updated the language model to a newer version and switched to generate entries with date, impact, title, and news.
entries.impact: Changelog entries now include more detailed information, improving clarity and usefulness.

entries.title: Basic back-end API implementation
entries.whats_new: Developed the foundational API for backend operations.
entries.impact: Enables backend data handling and API interactions for the project.

entries.title: Initial app setup and gitignore
entries.whats_new: Set up the project structure and configured gitignore for better version control management.
entries.impact: Provides a clean starting point for development.
